tasks.taskDescription: Use only personalized water bottle during the day.
Use only lunch box during the day.
Use WECO box to contain plastic bags.
Collect nylon bags and put it on WECO hangers.
Classify different types of waste in schools.
Use cloth face mask.
Reuse a nylon bag.
Reuse a plastic water bottle.
Say no to plastic straws.
1Collect the litters and classify them.
Bring with you your own basket, cloth bag when shopping.
Make yourself a cloth face mask.
Use your (personalized) water bottle when buying drinks outside.
Use only paper bag when buying bread outside.
Use tea leaves when making tea instead of tea bags.
Recycle a plastic product by yourself.
Make yourself a biological washing-up liquid.
Plant a tree inside a used a plastic bottle.
Plant your own vegetables (onions, lettuces, bean sprout...).
Use bar soaps instead of bottles of shower gel or shampoo.
